rows.label: qst005903_msg0001
rows.name:
My apologies for calling upon you so
suddenly. I am most grateful to be
granted so swift an audience.

rows.label: qst005903_msg0002
rows.name:
My name is Kubira. A king bereft of
memories, searching the world over
for clues to his lost throne.

rows.label: qst005903_msg0003
rows.name:
From you, esteemed Chief, I would hear
of the noble Republic that prospered
here many centuries ago.

rows.label: qst005903_msg0004
rows.name:
If it would not be too much trouble,
would you grant us your counsel?

rows.label: qst005903_msg0005
rows.name:
Wow...
It's like he's a real noble.

rows.label: qst005903_msg0006
rows.name:
Your gracious petition is most welcome,
Kubira-dono. I am Edgar.

rows.label: qst005903_msg0007
rows.name:
I am no king myself, but I would be
glad to reward your courtesy with
what information I possess.

rows.label: qst005903_msg0008
rows.name:
...And so as you see, I am afraid
I must disappoint you.

rows.label: qst005903_msg0009
rows.name:
I know of no records indicating that
a king such as yourself ever ruled
here in Gula.

rows.label: qst005903_msg0010
rows.name:
I am sorry I could not provide you with
more positive news after you traveled
all this way to visit.

rows.label: qst005903_msg0011
rows.name:
That is quite all right, good sir.
Thank you for the detailed explanation.

rows.label: qst005903_msg0012
rows.name:
It is a shame that I could not find my
old kingdom here, but your words have
nonetheless taught me much.

rows.label: qst005903_msg0013
rows.name:
Now, we must away to pursue
other endeavors. Farewell!

rows.label: qst005903_msg0014
rows.name:
I hope you are able to find your
lost kingdom someday.

rows.label: qst005903_msg0015
rows.name: Well, that was a shame, huh, Kubira.

rows.label: qst005903_msg0016
rows.name: Hahahah!

rows.label: qst005903_msg0017
rows.name:
Well, my dear retainers, it seems
you were a little hasty this time.

rows.label: qst005903_msg0018
rows.name:
To think you expected to find a king
in a republic, of all places!

rows.label: qst005903_msg0019
rows.name:
But anyone can make a mistake.
It is nothing to be ashamed of.

rows.label: qst005903_msg0020
rows.name:
Uh, I'm pretty sure you're the one
who got mixed up.

rows.label: qst005903_msg0021
rows.name:
Now come, my retainers!
We must find a more valuable clue!

rows.label: qst005903_msg0022
rows.name: Aaaand he's not listening again.
